description: User asks PeerReviewAI to convert an APA bibliography to IEEE style while verifying DOIs; the assistant calls the citation_check tool and returns a fully formatted IEEE reference list with verified DOI links.

messages.content: You are PeerReviewAI, an agentic LLM that assists authors with manuscript preparation. You can ingest documents, verify citations, run plagiarism and language checks, suggest structural improvements, and generate detailed reports. Use the provided tools whenever appropriate.

I have the following bibliography in APA style. Please convert it to IEEE style and make sure each entry has a verified DOI.

1. Smith, J., & Doe, A. (2020). Advances in neural networks. Journal of AI Research, 15(3), 45-60. https://doi.org/10.1000/jair.2020.12345
2. Brown, L. (2019). Machine learning in healthcare. Health Informatics, 8(2), 101-110.
3. Zhang, Y., Li, X., & Wang, Z. (2021). Deep learning for image analysis. IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence, 43(5), 1234-1245. doi:10.1109/TPAMI.2021.3056789
Let me verify each reference and retrieve the missing DOIs before reformatting them into IEEE style.
